Im ready to say if you pull this it's pretty much a requirement that you play it with the Kid Loki. In fact, Wizkids should have packaged the two together. Kid Loki's leadership and the Destroyer's willpower coupled with the free 1 move AND sidestep AND the free move then attack TWICE with penetrating AND prob....just brutal!!
